definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: tempest, storm-wind;—abs. [[סְעָרָה]] Is 29:6 + (so also 2Ki 2:1, 2Ki 2:11 Ginsb; Baer [[בַּסֳּעָרָה]]); cstr. [[סַעֲרַת]] Je 23:19, Je 30:23; pl. [[סְעָרוֹת]] Ez Eze 13:11, Eze 13:13 cstr. [[סַעֲרוֹת]] Zec 9:14; —tempest, storm-wind, as instr. of ´[[י]]'s wrath, Is 29:6 (+ [[סוּפָה]]), cf. Is 40:24, Is 41:16, also [[רוּחַ סְעָרוֹת]] Ez Eze 13:11, Eze 13:13 (against nation under fig. of wall); storm-wind of Elijah's translation 2Ki 2:1, 2Ki 2:11; of theophany Ez Eze 1:4 ([[רוּחַ]] [[סְעָרָה]]), Job 38:1, Job 40:6, and [[סַעֲרוֹת תֵּימָן]] Zec 9:14; ´[[סַעֲרַת י]] as fig. of ´[[י]]'s wrath Je 23:19, Je 30:23; of ordinary tempests only in late Psalm Psalm: [[רוּחַ סְעָרָה]] Ps 107:25, Ps 148:8, ´[[ס]] opp. [[דְּמָמָה]] Ps 107:29.
